Advanced data
Item ID20909

Buchu seeds are dropped by certain monsters found in the Chambers of Xeric. It can also be found at the end of a floor by raking the weeds near the entrance to the next level.

It can be planted in a resource room in the Chambers to grow buchu leaves.

Contents

  • 1 Farming info
  • 2 Item sources
  • 3 Changes
    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)
  • 4 Trivia

Farming info[edit | edit source]

Buchu
Level required 39

Seeds per 1
Payment No
Growth time 30 seconds
Regrow No
Navigation

Plant Buchu
Crop Grimy buchu leaf
Experience
Planting XP 6 xp
Checking XP No
Harvesting XP 15 xp

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
22 March 2018
(update)

The item's value was increased from 1 to 2.

5 October 2017
(update)

The item was recoloured.

Gallery (historical)[edit | edit source]
5 January 2017 – 5 October 2017
5 October 2017 – present

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • In Korean, "buchu" (부추) is a word meaning chives or leeks. The word "golpa" (골파), which the golpar herb is based on, shares a similar meaning.

[[File:Buchu seed detail.png|left|140px]]
'''Buchu seeds''' are dropped by certain monsters found in the [[Chambers of Xeric]]. It can also be found at the end of a floor by raking the weeds near the entrance to the next level.

It can be planted in a resource room in the Chambers to grow [[buchu leaf|buchu leaves]].

==Farming info==
{{Farming page|Buchu (plant)}}

==Item sources==
{{Drop sources|Buchu seed}}

==Trivia==
*In Korean, "buchu" (<big>부추</big>) is a word meaning chives or leeks. The word "golpa" (<big>골파</big>), which the [[golpar]] herb is based on, shares a similar meaning.
